definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: My father told me about the Hound of the Baskervilles.
sentences.chinese: 我的父亲告诉了我有关巴斯克维尔猎犬的情况。

sentences.english: He believed the story of the Hound of the Baskervilles.
sentences.chinese: 他相信巴斯克维尔猎犬的故事。

sentences.english: Where there is a demand for innovative ideas Barski Design develops new perspectives for its clients.
sentences.chinese: 巴斯克设计还为客户提供创新的设计点子。

sentences.english: She turned and went back towards her house, and I walked on to Baskerville Hall.
sentences.chinese: 她转身往回走往，我便继续向巴斯克维尔庄园走往。

sentences.english: So we went back to Baskerville Hall.
sentences.chinese: 于是我们便回巴斯克维尔庄园去了。

sentences.english: My father told me about the Hound of the Baskervilles.
sentences.chinese: 我的父亲告诉了我有关巴斯克维尔猎犬的事情。

sentences.english: The Busk top hides the grape crop which especially uses from the orchard in the best land parcel.
sentences.chinese: 巴斯克顶级特藏所用的葡萄收成自果园中最好的地块。

sentences.english: 'The people say it's the Hound of the Baskervilles, which is calling for some thing to hunt and kill.
sentences.chinese: 人们说这是巴斯克维尔猎犬，它正在召唤猎物。

sentences.english: He is the last of the Baskervilles.
sentences.chinese: 他是巴斯克维尔家族的最后一位成员。

sentences.english: Was it you who told Basque not to make a fire then?
sentences.chinese: 那么是您叫巴斯克不要生火的？

sentences.english: One famous Basque staple is salt cod ("bacalao").
sentences.chinese: 巴斯克的名菜之一是咸鳕鱼。

sentences.english: Basque nationalists of all stripes called for a rejection of the 1978 constitution.
sentences.chinese: 所有的巴斯克民族主义者曾呼吁废除1978年宪法。

sentences.english: Only the Basques resisted the conquering Aryan speech.
sentences.chinese: 只有巴斯克语抵制住了雅利安语的征服。

sentences.english: At last we reached the gates of Baskerville Hall.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于到了巴斯克维尔庄园的门口。

sentences.english: Basque returned, set a lighted candle on the chimney-piece and retired.
sentences.chinese: 巴斯克进来，把一支燃着的蜡烛放在炉架上又走了。

sentences.english: On the walls were the pictures of the Baskervilles of the past.
sentences.chinese: 墙上是巴斯克维尔家族的先辈们的画像。

definition: Galicia, province and former kingdom of northwest Spain
Brittany or Bretagne, area of western France
Castilla, old Spanish kingdom/modern Spanish provinces of Castilla-Leon and Castilla-La Mancha
ETA (Euskadi Ta Askatasuna or Basque homeland and freedom), Basque armed separatist group

pinyin: A1 er3 ji2 li4 ya4 ren2

definition: variant of 馬德里|马德里[Ma3 de2 li3], Madrid
Gijón (Asturian: Xixón), city in northwest Spain on the bay of Biscay
